page.title: 06Folk customs
page.content: Every year we follow several traditions.At Easter we get Easter eggs and on Easter Monday we go and roll them down hills,or down the stairs if it is raining.On Whit Sunday and the Bank Holiday Monday we go to a travelling fair up-town.On Halloween we dress up as witches,skeletons and ghosts.On Guy Fawkes night we go to Bonfires and Fireworks-its fun.There are birthdays and some people have parties and some people just get presents.Last but not least we have Christmas.We have parties and presents.My mum always leaves rum and biscuits for Father Christmas but I know that my dad eats and drinks them.There are other customs but these are the main ones.
